leaderBg: Accountant specializing in MCA funding companies. Was Andy Parker's accountant for about 5 years before being named CFO of Last Chance Funding in October 2018. Parker called him 'the most talented accountant in the MCA space.' Oversees financial strategy and portfolio performance for the LCF Group.
Oversees Processing, Valuation, Underwriting, and Closing at WBL. 12+ years in real estate investing. Joined WBL in 2021. Key buyer for loan processing technology.
30+ years in financial services. Oversees legal and compliance at World Business Lenders.
Manages referral partner relations and originations. 20+ years sales. Joined 2013.
Senior operational leadership. Oversees administration at World Business Lenders.
Started as loan broker in NYC. Founded Novac Nov 2021. Also invests in professional padel (Novac WPR circuit).

Manages broker relationships and deal sourcing at Novac Equities. Point of contact for ISOs partnering with Novac for funding programs. Reachable at 646-248-3303. Company operates two tiers: B-C Paper (up to $3M for $75K+ monthly rev) and MICRO platform ($10K+ monthly rev).

Registered as Aryeh Mandel, founder and manager of Diesel Funding LLC since May 2017. Also associated with Key Funding LLC. Based at 633 NE 167th Street, Suite 831, North Miami Beach, FL 33162. Company specializes in performance-based working capital for established businesses, known for funding complex and higher-risk deals that other funders won't touch. Same-day funding capability. Small team focused on revenue-driven underwriting decisions.

Leads APP Funding operations from 29 W 36th Street in NYC's Garment District. Company provides MCAs from $10K to $5M with no collateral required, repayment tied to daily credit card sales. BBB accredited since July 2023. Claims 500+ brands funded. Very small team of approximately 3 employees. Limited public profile beyond company operations.

Co-founded Credibly (originally Retail Capital) in 2010 with Edan King. Drove growth from startup to $3B+ deployed to 60K+ SMBs. Advocates for generative AI in underwriting. Leading Credibly's AI patent strategy. Management buyout in August 2023.
Co-founded Credibly alongside Ryan Rosett in 2010. Led the August 2023 management buyout. Operational leadership through scaling and rebranding from Retail Capital.
Leads technology and engineering at Credibly. Key decision-maker for AI/tech integrations. Overseeing implementation of patented generative AI underwriting systems.
Oversees financial strategy at Credibly. Important for ROI-based conversations about technology investments.
Chief Strategy Officer at Credibly. Drives strategic initiatives including the Credibly.ai innovation and technology showcase platform.
Leads business development, placement operations, bank marketing, national events, and regulatory relations at BHG Financial. Manages BHG's institutional network of 1,650+ banks.
Responsible for safeguarding BHG Financial's interests and reputation by managing and mitigating business risks across a $27B+ loan portfolio.
Driving Biz2Credit's next growth stage in embedded finance, modern lending, and AI-powered fintech.
Appointed in March 2025 to lead eCapital's growing commercial finance division.
Appointed September 2025; nearly 20 years of experience driving technology transformation in asset-backed finance and private credit.
Former OnDeck COO and General Counsel. Now co-leads the Enova Small Business division that includes the OnDeck brand.

Joined Ascentium Capital in 2014 to launch a direct sales division. Under his leadership, overall origination volume grew from $440M in 2014 to $1.8B in 2022. Succeeded founder Tom Depping as Group Leader following Depping's retirement. Leads the Regions Bank division that has funded $14.1B+ since 2011.

Founded Ascentium Capital in 2011. Led it for over a decade, building it into a premier equipment financing platform before Regions Bank acquired it in 2020. Retired in 2025 after a 40-year career in equipment finance.
Co-founded Drip Capital to simplify trade finance for cross-border SMEs. Company has grown to profitability serving exporters and importers across India and the Americas.
Leads the Lending-as-a-Service division, helping banks and lenders streamline SBA lending operations through iBusiness Funding's platform.
Oversees financial operations for Balboa Capital's equipment finance and small business lending divisions under Ameris Bank.
Leads operations and growth strategy for Clicklease's technology-driven equipment leasing platform.

Joined TimePayment in March 2018 as COO as part of leadership succession plan. Led record growth and numerous operating initiatives including comprehensive technology and service enhancements. Promoted to President & CEO. Company serves 100,000+ active accounts with transactions from $500 to $500K+.

leaderTitle: VP, Point of Sale & Terminal Leasing
leaderBg: Appointed in 2025 to lead TimePayment's expanding POS and terminal leasing business unit.
Co-founded Mundi to simplify cross-border trade for underserved SMEs. Company expanded beyond trade finance into payments, FX hedging, and cargo insurance.

Partner at LL Funds. Serves as equity investor and Chairman guiding Quantum Lending's vision and AI-era transformation. Quantum was formed in 2023 through merger of Fundation, Camino Financial, and Amount's SMB operations.
